## How to apply?

Applications will open before the start of the quarter.

## Expectations

- Work on a project under the guidance of a graduate student.

- Spend approximately 5 hours per week on the project.

- Meet with a graduate student mentor for 1 hour a week.

- Develop a presentation for the end of the quarter.
